reviewText:
Very well done and doesn't include non-essential opinions. Just what the Doctor ordered to save years of trying to evaluate, condense, refine, what you need to create Great work.  All Meat and no Potatoes.

I only wish I could have had been exposed to his workshops and been able to attend.
I am 69 years old been painting since sixties.  It would, I know it had to be a great experience painting with him.  I have all his books and they get better every time of go through them.  R.I.P. Kindred Spirit.
ANS
